channel.title: My JAVA 1.6.0. Please take some time to read this to help with the problem
channel.description:
hey so im Wkdpkz. Pretty new to the forums, although i've been playing mopar for a while.. Some of you may know me and recognise my name and thats why you visited my forums!!:Pwell to get to the point.. Today i figured out that there was a problem when i tried to go on www.moparisthebest.com.. well i came on here to have a look and i realised that many other people we're having that very same problem. The Problem seems to be that when you try to open your client there will be a RED X Now i read through some of the topics and tried to figure out the problem and in the end.. i DID. Now that i had the new JAVA version my client was up and running as normal.. UNTIL That very same RED X appeared again :cool:, now i then went onto downloading java again and again.. and even downloaded the client a few times but its still not working!! occasionally, the ORANGE java box will pop up for around 5 seconds and then the red X will appear again. I would like TO know if someone could help me please as i want to get back to playing asap.
THANKYOU
so very much for reading this topic it is much appreciated and i will look forward to helping you in the future! here is what my java console is saying.
Java Plug-in 1.6.0_02-ea Using JRE version 1.6.0_02-ea Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator
---------------------------------------------------- c: clear console window f: finalize objects on finalization queue g: garbage collect h: display this help message l: dump classloader list m: print memory usage o: trigger logging p: reload proxy configuration q: hide console r: reload policy configuration s: dump system and deployment properties t: dump thread list v: dump thread stack x: clear classloader cache 0-5: set trace level to <n> ----------------------------------------------------
load: class AppletBot not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: AppletBot at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed. at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 10 more
I DONT KNOW IF THAT INFORMATION IS OF ANY USE TO YOU BUT THANKYOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR TIME.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 03:49:47 PM[/size][hr]people should be helping me by now :)![br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 04:02:34 PM[/size][hr]wow. so its been viewed 9 times but no 1 wants to help me :(

item.dc:creator: @Wkdpkz Wkdpkz
item.description:
@Wkdpkz wrote:

hey so im Wkdpkz. Pretty new to the forums, although i’ve been playing mopar for a while… Some of you may know me and recognise my name and thats why you visited my forums!!:Pwell to get to the point…
Today i figured out that there was a problem when i tried to go on www.moparisthebest.com… well i came on here to have a look and i realised that many other people we’re having that very same problem.
The Problem seems to be that when you try to open your client there will be a RED X Now i read through some of the topics and tried to figure out the problem and in the end… i DID. Now that i had the new JAVA version my client was up and running as normal…
UNTIL
That very same RED X appeared again , now i then went onto downloading java again and again… and even downloaded the client a few times but its still not working!!
occasionally, the ORANGE java box will pop up for around 5 seconds and then the red X will appear again. I would like TO know if someone could help me please as i want to get back to playing asap.

THANKYOU

so very much for reading this topic it is much appreciated and i will look forward to helping you in the future! here is what my java console is saying.
